content:
What is the standard process for discussing and deciding on changes from an RFC? There are a couple of items in RFC 2906 that we might want to re-consider

  • Fields left out or left ambiguous
  • Related to fields left out, some fields can't be included because of their meaning within workspaces. It seems like overlapping two distinct meanings of fields restricts us now and in the future and having a more explicit table, like workspace.package similar to workspace.dependencies, would help
  • Locking of workspace.dependencies being extra work for unspecified benefits (alex piped in that he was mirroring patch but the value isn't there compared to patch)
